entry.title: L'Eclair: ‘Run’ (Feat. Gelli Haha) (KCRW Todays Top Tune)
entry.content:
L'Eclair: ‘Run’ (Feat. Gelli Haha)

 Best New Music

Genre-hopping Swiss outfit L’Eclair are the sonic equivalent of the pastry they’re named after.

Jun. 9

entry.title: Rochelle Jordan: ‘Crave’ (KCRW Todays Top Tune)
entry.content:
Rochelle Jordan: ‘Crave’

 Best New Music

Visionary artist Rochelle Jordan has a clear role in the design of future R&B. “Crave” is a dance floor-ready gem about passion and love that’ll keep you looking forward.

Jun. 6

entry.title: Tanika Charles: ‘How Long Will It Take’ (KCRW Todays Top Tune)
entry.content:
Tanika Charles: ‘How Long Will It Take’

 Best New Music

Canadian soul star Tanika Charles has done a lot of mending in her life.

Jun. 5

entry.title: Yuno: ‘Blest’ (KCRW Todays Top Tune)
entry.content:
Yuno: ‘Blest’

 Best New Music

Enjoy the ebullient title track from NYC-based producer Yuno’s debut album, Blest. Honing his skills in his Floridian childhood bedroom eventually led to broader platforms.

Jun. 4

entry.title: SOFI TUKKER: ‘Bread (butter version)’ Feat. Seu Jorge (KCRW Todays Top Tune)
entry.content:
SOFI TUKKER: ‘Bread (butter version)’ Feat. Seu Jorge

 Best New Music

Prepare to feel all the feels when you tune into this silky-smooth new jam from SOFI TUKKER .

Jun. 3

entry.title: Alison Krauss & Union Station: ‘Richmond On The James’ (KCRW Todays Top Tune)
entry.content:
Alison Krauss & Union Station: ‘Richmond On The James’

 Best New Music

Alison Krauss might be best known for rocking out with Robert Plant, but she’s plenty accomplished in her own right.

Jun. 2

entry.title: Natalie Bergman: ‘Gunslinger’ (KCRW Todays Top Tune)
entry.content:
Natalie Bergman: ‘Gunslinger’

 Best New Music

Soul-siren Natalie Bergman returns with her sophomore LP My Home Is Not In This World (due July 18 via Third Man Records).

May 30

entry.title: Nation of Language: ‘Inept Apollo’ (KCRW Todays Top Tune)
entry.content:
Nation of Language: ‘Inept Apollo’

 Best New Music

Brooklyn-based trio Nation of Language has an ardent-and-ever-expanding international audience for their danceable take on new wave, post-punk, and shoegaze.

May 29
